description:
Valgaav is unleashed! Filia and Jillas try to stop him, along with Lina`s crew. As the powers of darkness reach unbelievable levels, Lina finds the Dragon Slave is worthless!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Celui sorti de l`étoile des ténèbres !
He Who Emerges from the Dark Star!
Yami no Hoshi yori Izuru Mono!
